Create Line 5: Starting at (0.0055, 0.0441) and ending at (0.0, 0.0441). Create Line 6: Starting at (0.0, 0.0441) and ending at (0.0, 0.0). Sketch Face 2: Create Line 1: Starting at (0.7059, 0.0) and ending at (0.75, 0.0). Create Line 2: Starting at (0.75, 0.0) and ending at (0.75, 0.0441). Create Line 3: Starting at (0.75, 0.0441) and ending at (0.7445, 0.0441). Create Line 4: Starting at (0.7445, 0.0441) and ending at (0.7445, 0.0055). Create Line 5: Starting at (0.7445, 0.0055) and ending at (0.7059, 0.0055). Create Line 6: Starting at (0.7059, 0.0055) and ending at (0.7059, 0.0). Extrusion: Extrude the sketch along all normals by 0.1434 units in both directions with a scaling factor of 0.75. The extruded shape represents a new solid body. The final shape is a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, slightly angled front face, centered, and having a simple, untextured appearance. The dimensions are: 0.75 (length) x 0.2868 (width) x 0.75 (height).</description>

Proceed to the following part(s) for further instructions.</description>
